title: The Daring Escape of Chhatrapati Shivaji from Agra

chapters.title: Imprisonment in Agra
chapters.description: Shivaji Maharaj is detained by Aurangzeb during his visit to Agra, where tensions rise between the Maratha leader and the Mughal Emperor.

chapters.title: Strategizing an Escape
chapters.description: Shivaji devises a clever plan to elude captivity, using disguise and subterfuge to evade the Mughal guards.

chapters.title: Execution of the Plan
chapters.description: Shivaji and his son cleverly hide within fruit baskets to be smuggled out of the fort, bypassing security checks.

chapters.title: Return to Freedom
chapters.description: Shivaji successfully escapes Agra and reunites with his followers, marking a triumphant moment in Maratha history.
